name: Proelium no Cutremari
description:
English

This is a game developed for the Raven Jam, a jam whose theme was crappy games with humor and an unexpected ending.

Proelium no Cutremari is a magnificent game that tells a story never seen before.

Features (some may be questioned):

  • A magnificent soundtrack that references pieces like 4'33 "
  • Animated scenes of incredible polishing.
  • A magnificent narrative.
  • Polished control.
  • Outstanding stage design.
  • Incredible technical solidity, completely bug free.
  • Incredibly humorous humor.
  • Impeccable sound design.

Español

Magnifico juego que relata una historia nunca antes vista. 

Incluye: 

  • Una magnifica banda sonora de la cual destaca la pieza 4'33"
  • Escenas cinematográficas de increíble pulido.
  • Una narrativa magnifica.
  • Un pulido control.
  • Destacable diseño de escenarios.
  • Increíble solidez técnica, completamente libre de bugs.
  • Un humor increíblemente humorístico.
  • Impecable diseño de sonidos.
